description: A young witch who was cursed during her childhood. The only one who could lift this curse is Yoshikawa Haruo, which forces her to study at the same school and move into the Yoshikawa residence as the maid. For most of the series, Ayumi tries to seduce Haruo and "make him a man", by flirting and casting spells. Because of this, she and Maika constantly get into arguments and fights - which Ayumi inevitably loses.
name: Mamiya Ayumi
